website_summaries.verdict: Great for medium-sized and large businesses with moderate binding needs.
pros: Binds up to 500 sheets and punches 25 sheets at once, which is more than other models
You can punch more pages while it’s binding because binding portion is removable
Automatic model, so doesn’t cause arm or wrist strain
cons: Punched holes sometimes not as clean as they should be

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, no stress
customer_reviews.text: Our office is moderately busy, not too big, not to small. We were using a manual binder. We have training books I make up for our employees. It took so much of my time and the wasted paper from punching the holes incorrectly. This galaxy 500 is a dream compared to the manual one we have. Stack in the slot and press a button. Easy as that. So happy with this new tool.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Low quality ripoff
customer_reviews.text: Complete junk!! This is the 3rd galaxy 500 ive owned. The first one lasted almost 5 yeas before it died. When i got the second one they had really dropped the quality and it lasted two years. The one i just received worked for a whole two hours before starting to act up. What a waste of money and really cheesy to downgrade the quality
customer_reviews.author: KOLLEEN MORSE

customer_reviews.title: Great for making books for my students to write notes ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for making books for my students to write notes in. So far I have not had any problems with the binder and find it very easy to use. I have had this for about 4 months and I have made around 200 books.
customer_reviews.author: PandJinCT

customer_reviews.title: Electric beats manual.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I’ve been using a manual one. I love this electric one. It’s easier and faster. Plus two of us can process our books at the same time. Which makes it even faster.
customer_reviews.author: Darkredgem

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done, when it works
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine machine, a good balance between a really nice one and a cheap one. For moderate use, it's perfect. Unfortunately, we've had two breakdowns. After about 1000 bindings, our first one broke irreparably. Fellowes was nice enough to replace it for us for free. After about another 1000 bindings, that one started to have an issue. My coworker and I disassembled the entire thing (no small task, this thing is surprisingly intricate on the inside) and found no issues, but on reassembling it worked fine. We'll see how long it lasts now!
customer_reviews.author: John Seale

customer_reviews.title: Quality product - happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for a few months now and it was a good choice for our business. Reliable, sturdy and easy to use. Handles respectable quantities of paper. Previously had a similar machine that after many good years of service, had some of its plastic parts fail. Therefore, we have some experience from which to base our strong review on. I don't recall how much it cost, but I know we are pleased with this comb binder!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: As good as I hoped it would be
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bound 20-30 documents ranging from 10-250 pages each. The electronic punch works great and will easily handle 20+ sheets of paper at a time. Putting the pages on the combs is pretty standard. I like the drawer in the front that allows me to store clear cover pages and several combs. I haven’t had any issues thus far and am more than satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John Riggins

customer_reviews.title: Saves hours over non-electric binders
customer_reviews.text: As an educator, I've been binding instructional and student materials for years. This high-capacity binder is easy to use and saves me so much time, especially since the punchers have never been stuck in the machine when punching thick transparent covers. I have one at work and bought one for home. Its a little pricey compared to non-electric binders, but definitely worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: J Lewis

customer_reviews.title: good binding system
customer_reviews.text: This binding system has been a dream! Its ability to separate the binding part from the hole punch is great now we can separate the work and get much more done in a short time
customer_reviews.author: office supply

customer_reviews.title: FAST & Presentation Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I have the old fashioned one and it was dying. This is so amazing and so fast. I can't believe how I struggled with the old back in the day. I absolutely love it !!! I highly recommend it to every single person.
customer_reviews.author: Zara MD

customer_reviews.title: I really really like my binding machine
customer_reviews.text: I really really like my binding machine! It has kept me organized with my papers. I would highly recommend the binding machine to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Bollier

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Our binding machine broke after 5 months of light use. IS there a warranty available?
customer_reviews.author: Tom Chandler

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: The price was great on this product. This product would be great for someone or a company that binds a lot of things. It is fast and simple to use. With this machine it is a little on the heavy side so i would say use it as a stationary device vs. thinking it can be used as a -portable device.
customer_reviews.author: Facilities D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. packed well, was delivered as requested. no set up. quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect, works well for the office that it was ordered for (12pple)
customer_reviews.author: Stacey K Spurlock

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is so quiet. It punches the paper quickly and makes assembling reports & proposals very quick & easy. I especially like the option to remove the assembly unit so more than one person is able to punch & assemble documents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good. The holes it punches aren't as "clean" ...
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good. The holes it punches aren't as "clean" as some others but it does the job. I like the storage it offers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing power cable
customer_reviews.text: the reason i gave this a 2 stars is:-when the package was opened the power cable was missing. Where is the power cable ?
customer_reviews.author: trinighul1

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to operate and works really well. Nice compact size and sleek appearance. I would recommend this machine for anyone that needs to bind small to midsize projects.
customer_reviews.author: Adminservices4u

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this machine very much. Now I am a book maker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Cuts evenly, easily and assembles my book project.
customer_reviews.author: Suzietk

customer_reviews.title: Substantial and Effective
customer_reviews.text: This unit did exactly what I wanted. Within the first hour I used it, I bound a 350 (approx) page document and it was quick and easy. No surprises, just good functionality.
customer_reviews.author: GizmoGuy 777

customer_reviews.title: The Machine that Works
customer_reviews.text: My project looked very professional, and I will have many more use for my Fellows Binding Machine Galaxy E 500.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Archibald

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality
customer_reviews.text: Sooooooooo much easier and efficient than manual. Great build quality!
customer_reviews.author: Tony G

customer_reviews.title: Nice Machine
customer_reviews.text: Easy to work with. Has reduced my binding time. State office, binds 60 agenda books each month. Much easier to use than our old binding maching.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The employees who have used the binding machine like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good and sturdy machine. Great for small and medium offices.
customer_reviews.author: Cristianrojo

customer_reviews.title: perfect for mild use
customer_reviews.text: The unit is compact and efficient, perfect for mild use.
customer_reviews.author: DelVal Soil & Environmental Consultants, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Meager Instructions
customer_reviews.text: Large machine requires lots of space. Operating instructions meager, at best. Required call to customer assistance who, like the product instructions, had a "mental block". The instructions were composed as if this user already knew had to operate the machine. Pictures were similarly un-informative. Also, dial used to set paper length is cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: JMG

customer_reviews.title: Great - especially if you are part of a team
customer_reviews.text: Things I love about this model: The punch is electric and easily handled the specified number/weight of paper It is easy to adjust the punch for precise alignment The comb binder is easily lifted out and can be used by another person to assemble the books It has a handy drawer to store combs in It can handle a large variety of comb sizes It has a sturdy, durable quality Things to be aware of: It's a pretty large footprint - not necessarily a bad thing. I think this will give years of use and of the various comb binders I have used, I would rate this one up at the top.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Owens

customer_reviews.title: Expensive But Works As Intended
customer_reviews.text: The Fellowes Galaxy E Comb Binding Machine is an expensive office product. There are no two ways around this fact. At roughly $400 it is intended for large offices or for regular and frequent binding tasks. On the other hand, if you do have serious binding needs, this product is nearly perfect. And the fact that the device can have two people working on binding at the same time is a definite plus! Given this and the product's performance, it really can represent a worthwhile purchase. If you have serious binding needs. the Fellowes Galaxy E Comb Binding Machine is really hard to beat!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey N. Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Short & simple: this binder is sturdy, works efficiently, and does a great job! While this is probably better suited for someone in an office, it's nice to have in our home to organize a few projects that we've had in boxes. I don't feel like we use it to it's full capacity. The price is steep and so I'm glad we got this through the vine because I honestly wouldn't spend that kind of money to get our few projects.
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Really great binding machine!
customer_reviews.text: The Fellowes Galaxy E Comb Binding Machine is a fantastic binding product. It was easy to set up and use. It creates bound documents of all sizes in a flash. Be aware that although the description says it's an electronic binding machine, in fact it is an electronic hole puncher. The binding is done by hand, but it only takes about 5 seconds to bind it by hand. It does have a large footprint, so it's not for someone with very little desk space. All of that said, I am very satisfied with the product!
customer_reviews.author: L. Moskowitz

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and easy to operate to last a Lifetime!
customer_reviews.text: I have had many cheaper versions of this product over the years. Fellows makes many types of binding machines. This is among the medium higher end. It is super well built and easy to operate. It can handle high capacity and the selection of binding materials is very complete. I highly recommend it - It has no motors and will probably last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Zeb

customer_reviews.title: Good for Presentations
customer_reviews.text: This desktop model takes up little room and is easy to operate. It adds spiral binding to materials which makes them look professional and neat. Saves money by not having to take to copy center. If you do a lot of handouts, manuals, or meeting notes, this is a good addition to your office. Saves time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality Fellowes product. As mentioned by another reviewer, it has a sizable footprint for a small office, but the usefulness makes it earn its keep. Small runs are best with this machine. I will be making inexpensive bound planners for some of my 'clients' for 2012 to help teach them the process of planning.
customer_reviews.author: HuskerFan

customer_reviews.title: What a God Send,
customer_reviews.text: This binding machine is a most excellent piece of equipment. It has really speeded up the workload in our office. It is very fast and efficient. We love it. Would recommend any large office environment that does a lot of binding to consider purchasing
customer_reviews.author: J. Reese

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to our elementary school's secretary, and she informed me that minutes later she was up and running. She was super impressed with how easy it was to set up and use vs the aging one the school had at hand. I will ask her in a few more months on how the punch is holding up to their busy office demands.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: This binder is great! Works as it is suppose to. Once you get it set up and understand how it puts thing together, you can bind about anything you want to. A welcome addition.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Hudspeth

customer_reviews.title: I can't say anything about the product itself because the ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't say anything about the product itself because the box arrived damaged. I couldn't take the chance that the impact had affected the machine so I've returned it. I will update my review one this is resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

product_meta.title: Fellowes 5218301 Galaxy 500 Electric Comb Binding System, 500 Sheets, 19 5/8x17 3/4x6 1/2, Gray
product_meta.description: Style:Galaxy EThe high performance Fellowes Galaxy E Comb Binding Machine features effortless electric operation for large offices. Punches up to 25 sheets at the touch of a button and binds up to 500 sheets with a 2 Inches comb. Vertical document loading ensures accurate punch alignment. Removable binding mechanism can be used separately for increased productivity. Releasable dies for different document sizes. Features built-in comb storage tray with integrated document measurement device for added convenience and quick set-up. Adjustable edge guide centers documents with ease. Includes front-access waste tray and binding starter pack (contents: 20 pack assorted kit).
feature_bullets: Automatically punches up to 25 sheets of paper at a time in the touch of a button and binds up to 500 sheets with a 2” comb
Enhanced accuracy edge guide centers documents with ease for pinpoint punching
Removable binding mechanism can be used separately for increased productivity
Built-in comb storage tray with integrated document measurement device for added convenience and quick set-up
Loads vertically for accurate punch alignment

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars84 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
